attributes.action: Make it mandatory for BBC to report daily on climate change on major news progs
attributes.additional_details: We want them to properly report & inform  - daily - on major programmes like Today on Radio 4 and on TV BBC News.  We want news and evidence about climate change to inform and educate all viewers so more people will be informed and can decide what we can each & collectively can do about it.
attributes.background: BBC has a remit to inform, educate & entertain. But it’s not telling us anything like enough about the realities of climate change. It avoids the issues or makes light of them.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because BBC programmes and services are the responsiblity of the BBC, which is independent of the UK Government or Parliament.

If you would like to complain to the BBC you can do so here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/faqs/complaints_process
